creator: mbm@ptc.com
text:
It appears ant.bat only clears the classpath when -noclasspath is passed
directly on the command line.  For completeness, shouldn't ant.bat also call
clearclasspath if ANT_ARGS contains -noclasspath?

This only matters since we are getting "input line is too long" when CLASSPATH
is set, so we have to work around it.

I do not know if this is possible to do in ant.bat.
If anyone has a suggestion please send an example.
